title: Nebulight Interactive Slideshow
description: A showcase of the Nebulight component capabilities with various configuration options.

slides.alt: Vivid surreal landscape with rainbow-colored trees and glowing river
slides.title: Valley of the Chromatic Sun
slides.caption: A radiant dreamscape where light bends, rivers glow, and colors remember.
slides.description: In this surreal terrain, the sun unfolds like memory, casting waves of color across a forested valley. Each ripple is mood. Each hue, a signal. Nova watches as the land breathes in light.

slides.alt: Spiral galaxy with bright center and sweeping arms
slides.title: Spiral Galaxy
slides.caption: A magnificent spiral galaxy millions of light-years away.
slides.description: Spiral galaxies like this one contain billions of stars and often feature prominent dust lanes along their spiral arms.

slides.alt: Gas giant planet with swirling storm patterns
slides.title: Gas Giant
slides.caption: A gas giant planet with complex atmospheric patterns.
slides.description: Gas giants are primarily composed of hydrogen and helium and feature dynamic weather systems visible as bands and spots.

slides.alt: Eagle nebula with pillars of creation
slides.title: Eagle Nebula
slides.caption: The famous Eagle Nebula featuring the pillars of creation.
slides.description: The Eagle Nebula contains the iconic 'Pillars of Creation', towering columns of gas and dust where new stars are forming.

slides.alt: Confidential project screenshot with NDA protection
slides.title: Project Alpha (NDA)
slides.caption: Confidential project interface protected by NDA.
slides.description: This slide demonstrates the NDA protection features of Nebulight, including red glass overlay and blur effects.
